rows.label: tev000292_MSG0001
rows.name:
What a pleasing coincidence to see you here,
[ST:playername ]. Or perhaps it is destiny?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0002
rows.name:
After enjoying some idle chitchat with Mr. Nagi,
we were attempting to play a little word game that he
taught to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0003
rows.name:
It is a game played by many Earth cultures called
shiritori, word chain, and antakshariâ€”among other
names.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0004
rows.name:
The rules are simple: choose a word that begins with
the final sound of the previous word. Yet our attempts
to play have all ended in failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0010
rows.name: Play

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0011
rows.name: Play with L to help him improve his skills.

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain to L that you're not familiar with the game.

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0005
rows.name: We are most grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0006
rows.name:
Then if we may be so bold, would you choose a word
with which to start the game?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0007
rows.name:
But...we've been told anyone can play it!
And yet, we cannot! And until we learn, how will we
ever be accepted by the humans in this city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0008
rows.name:
The Ma-non and Nopon struggle with this as well.
It is an issue that could divide us at a time when unity
is sore and needed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0009
rows.name:
We trust you share our desire to see the various
residents of New LA live together in peace?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0010
rows.name:
Then we insist you play a game with us.
You need only speak a single word.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0110
rows.name: Say "Game"

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0111
rows.name: Begin with the word "game."

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0120
rows.name: Say "BLADE"

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0121
rows.name: Begin with the word "BLADE."

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0130
rows.name: Say "Whale"

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0131
rows.name: Begin with the word "whale."

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0011
rows.name:
Quite fine. Mr. Nagi had mentioned that a
straightforward word is the typical opening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then we must say a word that begins with an
"mmm" sound. Like...mimeosome![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0013
rows.name:
An interesting gambit. Then we must respond with a
word that begins with a "d" sound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0014
rows.name: How about...district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0015
rows.name: So we need a word that begins with an "l" sound...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0016
rows.name: How about "Lifehold"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0017
rows.name:
It's strange how we don't seem to have any problem
playing this game with you, but were so unsuccessful
when playing with others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0030
rows.name: Theorize

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest the other players didn't understand the rules.

rows.label: tev000292_JNK0040
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: tev000292_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that all players need to speak the same language.

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0018
rows.name:
We do not believe that was the issue. The Ma-non and
Nopon with whom we played were quite confident that
they understood the rules completely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0019
rows.name: And yet... Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh! Of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0021
rows.name:
How could we have missed it?
The answer is oblivious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0022
rows.name:
Each of the players in the game was speaking an
entirely different language![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0023
rows.name:
We were speaking English, the Nopon was speaking
Nopon, and the Ma-non was speaking Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0024
rows.name:
Somehow we were able to communicate, but of course
the sounds that formed our words would have differed
from language to language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0025
rows.name: How could we have failed to notice that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0026
rows.name:
So we must attain a sufficient level of fluency in the
Ma-non language to play word games properly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0027
rows.name:
It's settling then. If you'll excuse us, we have a great
deal of studying to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0028
rows.name: Oh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0029
rows.name:
But of course, you're exactly right!
How could we not have realized that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0030
rows.name:
Each of the players in the game was speaking an
entirely different language![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0031
rows.name:
We were speaking English, the Nopon was speaking
Nopon, and the Ma-non was speaking Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0032
rows.name:
Somehow we were able to communicate, but of course
the sounds that formed our words would have differed
from language to language.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0033
rows.name:
We are so glad we came to you with this problem.
Your powers of perspiration are second and none![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0034
rows.name:
So we must attain a sufficient level of fluency in the
Ma-non language to play word games properly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000292_MSG0035
rows.name:
It's settled then. If you'll excuse us, we have a great
deal of studying to do![ST:wait ]
